DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Trial Changing Exercise Physical Activity Behavior Asthma Patients
DOC.detailed_description: The primary objective randomize trial evaluate novel intervention induce positive affect induce self-affirmation increase physical activity patient asthma . At start trial patient conjunction physician select program mild moderate physical activity exercise adopt maintain routine basis . All patient record perceive exertion pedometer measurement log diary . All patient contact telephone set time interval encourage continue select physical activity exercise . Patients randomize intervention arm also receive induced positive affect self-affirmation throughout study period . Patients control arm receive positive affect self-affirmation component .
DOC.criteria: Patients eligible study physician consider medically able participate , 18 year age old diagnosis mild moderate asthma base NHLBI Asthma Expert Panel 's classification system rate symptom , frequency exacerbation , nocturnal attack , activity restriction , use medication , pulmonary function . Patients exclude study follow reason : If unable walk several block whatever reason ; If musculoskeletal neurological deficit preclude increased physical activity ; If pulmonary disease ; If cardiac disease severe comorbidity ; If unable provide inform consent cognitive deficit ; If refuse participate .
